project.name: Innovation Project
description: Forget reviews - You can just number them 1, 2, 3, etc.
20-gram protein claim (claims should follow a secure workflow).
After each gate, use a template/form to ask team members: What worked well? What could have been improved?

subtasks.name: Product Solution
subtasks.description: Identify solutions to meet product goals.

subtasks.name: Artwork Design and Research
subtasks.description: Creative team to develop artwork concepts and studies.

subtasks.name: Claims Review
subtasks.description: Regulatory team to review claims, including the 20-gram protein claim.

subtasks.name: Consumer Research
subtasks.description: Conduct research to understand consumer preferences.

subtasks.name: Trial Analysis
subtasks.description: Evaluate trial results and refine the product.

subtasks.name: Item Data Request
subtasks.description: Automate item generation through data entry forms.

subtasks.name: Data Release
subtasks.description: Ensure all required data is shared and approved.
